Info

Fallout EP is the first release of Swedish musician Johannes Dyplin&#039;s solo
project Sturmreaktor. Inspired by the works of Combichrist, Grendel, Colony 5
and Funker Vogt, the EP deals with themes such as war, destruction, human
ignorance and decay. The tracks features blasting electronic dancebeats,
screaming synth loops and powerful lyrics, in what could be defined as a fresh
mixture of EBM, synthpop and industrial.
The title song, Fallout, is inspired by the Fallout games and
partly written as to celebrate the release third installment in the series.
The EP also features a dance remix of the song Rise, mixed by Jester Project.

This EP is released under Creative Commons licence, because culture is
something that belongs to everyone, and shouldn&#039;t be a privilege for the rich :)

For more information, lyrics and ways to support the band visit:
www.sturmreaktor.com
